name: Total Kilometers Travelled
query: SELECT Name, OrigPurchaseOrderNo, SUM(Distance*Quantity) AS TotalKM FROM {table_name} INNER JOIN CityPairs ON {table_name}.CityPair = CityPairs.Pair INNER JOIN TeamCodes ON {table_name}.OrigPurchaseOrderNo = TeamCodes.Code WHERE CityPair <> "" AND {where_clause} GROUP BY OrigPurchaseOrderNo ORDER BY Name ASC;

name: Number of Trips
query: SELECT Name, OrigPurchaseOrderNo, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalTrips FROM {table_name} INNER JOIN TeamCodes ON {table_name}.OrigPurchaseOrderNo = TeamCodes.Code WHERE {where_clause} GROUP BY OrigPurchaseOrderNo ORDER BY Name ASC;

name: Total Expenditure
query: SELECT Name, OrigPurchaseOrderNo, SUM(TotalPayable) AS TotalCost FROM {table_name} INNER JOIN TeamCodes ON {table_name}.OrigPurchaseOrderNo = TeamCodes.Code WHERE {where_clause} GROUP BY OrigPurchaseOrderNo ORDER BY Name ASC;

name: Total CO2
query: SELECT Name, OrigPurchaseOrderNo, Round(SUM(Factor*Distance*Quantity), 2) AS CO2 FROM {table_name} INNER JOIN CityPairs ON {table_name}.CityPair = CityPairs.Pair INNER JOIN CO2Factor ON {table_name}.Market = CO2Factor.Type INNER JOIN TeamCodes ON {table_name}.OrigPurchaseOrderNo = TeamCodes.Code WHERE CityPair <> "" AND {where_clause} GROUP BY OrigPurchaseOrderNo ORDER BY Name ASC;
